00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGECONSTROWIT24BP_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGECONSTROWIT24BP_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 class CImageConstRowIterator24bp
00038 {
00039 protected: // attributes
00041     UINT8* m_pCurr;
00043         UINT8* m_pEnd;
00044 public:
00050         inline CImageConstRowIterator24bp(UINT8* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex);
00052         inline CImageConstRowIterator24bp& operator=(const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& It);
00055         inline CImageConstRowIterator24bp End() const;
00057         inline CImageConstRowIterator24bp& operator++() { m_pCurr+=3; return *this; }
00059         inline CImageConstRowIterator24bp operator++(int) { CImageConstRowIterator24bp t=*this; m_pCurr+=3; return t;}
00061         inline UINT32 operator*(){return ((*((UINT32*)m_pCurr)) & 0xffffff);}
00063         inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i) {return (*(m_pCurr+i*3) & 0xffffff);}
00066         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& q);
00069         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& q);
00072         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& q);
00073 };
00074 
00075 inline CImageConstRowIterator24bp::CImageConstRowIterator24bp(UINT8* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex):
00076                 m_pEnd(pActualRow + MaxIndex*3), m_pCurr(pActualRow + StartIndex*3)
00077 {
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 inline CImageConstRowIterator24bp& CImageConstRowIterator24bp::operator=(const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& It)
00082 {
00083         m_pCurr = It.m_pCurr;
00084         m_pEnd  = It.m_pEnd;
00085         return *this;
00086 }
00087 
00088 inline CImageConstRowIterator24bp CImageConstRowIterator24bp::End() const
00089 {
00090         CImageConstRowIterator24bp t = *this;
00091         t.m_pCurr = m_pEnd;
00092         return t;
00093 }
00094 
00095 inline bool operator==(const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& q)
00096 {
00097         return (p.m_pCurr==q.m_pCurr);
00098 }
00099 
00100 inline bool operator!=(const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& q)
00101 {
00102         return !(p==q);
00103 }
00104 
00105 inline bool operator<(const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator24bp& q)
00106 {
00107         return (p.m_pCurr<q.m_pCurr);
00108 }
00109 
00110 } // end namespace ipl
